attributes.action: pass in to law that there must be a General Election whenever a serving Prime Minister retires,resigns or stands down from that office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It should be a requirement in law that no political party shall continue in Government until a General Election has been called following the resignation, retirement or standing down for whatever reason of the incumbant,from the position of Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
